channel.title: Pages on Ishbir's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Ishbir's Blog

item.title: About
item.author: ishbir@ishbir.com (Ishbir Singh)
item.description:
My name is Ishbir Singh and describing myself as a software engineer would present you an incomplete picture of who I am. That is a very broad question, difficult to answer in one page.

A better question would be: what do I like to do? I like to travel, live in new cultures and learn new languages. I like to work to learn and not vice-versa. I like to be curious about life and other people.

“I don’t understand. Where does sofwtware engineering fit in?” you ask. I look at machines and picture the humans behind them: their motivation, story and goals. Software for me isn’t just lines of code. It’s a piece of art; a story waiting to be discovered and written. It is with this attitude that I work on any project: 100% of emotional and intellectual dedication. I am invested in the success of not only my project, but also of the organization behind it.

My technological interests change every few years but right now, they are: crypto-currencies, security and artificial intelligence.

Why’d I start this blog?

I felt like I needed a place to put together all my programming research and improve my writing skills. What better way than to blog about it? Hopefully it would help someone with their own endeavors.

Also, a blog is an excellent marketing tool. :-)

Pss…

Want to get in touch? Check out the links in the footer!
